meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of photojournalism.
meanings.sent1: The photojournalistic images captured the essence of the event.
meanings.sent2: Her photojournalistic approach to storytelling made her work stand out.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to take a photojournalistic selfie with the camera.
meanings.sent4: His photojournalistic eye saw the world in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The photojournalistic style of reporting brought the news to life.

meanings.definition: In the style or manner of photojournalism.
meanings.sent1: The documentary had a photojournalistic feel to it.
meanings.sent2: The photojournalistic shots captured the raw emotions of the protest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel posed in a photojournalistic manner for the camera.
meanings.sent4: Her photojournalistic storytelling painted a vivid picture of the war.
meanings.sent5: The photojournalistic approach added depth to the article.
